scripts.start-all: concurrently -c "#93c5fd,#c4b5fd,#fdba74,#308446" "npm run dev" "npm run start-laravel" "npm run ngrok-tunnel" "php artisan queue:listen" --names='vite,laravel,ngrok,queue'
scripts.start-all-bun: concurrently -c "#93c5fd,#c4b5fd,#fdba74,#308446" "bun run dev" "bun run start-laravel" "bun run ngrok-tunnel" "php artisan queue:listen" --names='vite,laravel,ngrok,queue'
scripts.start-all-built: concurrently -c "#c4b5fd,#fdba74,#308446" "npm run start-laravel" "npm run ngrok-tunnel" "php artisan queue:listen" --names='laravel,ngrok,queue'
